#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#define Maxx 1000
using namespace std;

int input(void)
{
    int i,j,k,x;
    char ch;
    bool sol;
    ch=getchar();
    x=0;
    sol=true;
    while((ch>='0'&&ch<='9')||(ch=='.'))
    {
        if(ch!='.')
        {
            x=x*10+ch-'0';
        }
        else
        {
            sol=false;
        }
        ch=getchar();
    }
    if(sol)
    {
        x=x*100;
    }
    return x;
}

main()
{
    int i,j,k,l,t,n,m,cnt=0,test,y,p,x;
    int a[Maxx];

    t=input();
    t/=100;
    while(t--)
    {
        cnt++;
        n=input();
        m=input();
        n/=100;
        m/=100;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            x=input();
            a[i]=x;
        }

        //for(i=0;i<n;i++) cout<<a[i]<<" ";


        printf("Case %d:\n",cnt);

        sort(a,a+n);

        for(i=0;i<m;i++)
        {
            printf("Scenario %d:\n",i+1);
            //cout<<x<<test<<endl;
            test=input();
            p=n-1;

            while(test!=0)
            {
                if(a[p]<=test)
                {
                    y=test/a[p];
                    if(a[p]%100==0)
                    printf("%d %d\n",a[p]/100,y);
                    else
                    {
                        if((a[p]/10)!=0)
                        {
                            printf("0.");
                            printf("%d %d\n",a[p],y);
                        }
                        else
                        {
                            printf("0.0");
                            printf("%d %d\n",a[p],y);
                        }
                    }
                    test%=a[p];
                }
                else
                {
                    p--;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
